treatment-md.title: Brusqeulia yunkensis Santa-Rita & Baixeras, 2018, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Two new species of Brusqeulia Razowski & Becker, 2000 from the Neotropics, with comments on the systematic position of the genus in relation to the Apolychrosis Amsel, 1962 group of genera (Lepidoptera, Tortricidae, Cochylini)
